author: wn.com
title: How to measure the performance of smart cities (ISO - International Organization for Standardization)
text: ( Source : ISO - International Organization for Standardization ) ISO/TS 37151 outlines 14 categories of basic community needs (from the perspective of residents, city managers and the environment) to measure the performance of smart community
